modelValue.description: Specifies whether a inputotp should be checked or not.

invalid.description: When present, it specifies that the component should have invalid state style.
invalid.description_zh: 如果存在，则它指定组件应具有无效的状态样式。

disabled.description: When present, it specifies that the component should be disabled.
disabled.description_zh: 如果存在，则它指定应禁用该组件。

readonly.description: When present, it specifies that an input field is read-only.
readonly.description_zh: 如果存在，则指定输入字段为只读。

variant.description: Specifies the input variant of the component.

tabindex.description: Index of the element in tabbing order.
tabindex.description_zh: 按 Tab 键顺序排列的元素索引。

integerOnly.description: When present, it specifies that an input field is integer-only.
integerOnly.description_zh: 如果存在，则指定输入字段仅为整数。

dt.description: It generates scoped CSS variables using design tokens for the component.
dt.description_zh: 它使用组件的设计令牌生成范围限定的 CSS 变量。

pt.description: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.
pt.description_zh: 用于将属性传递给组件内的 DOM 元素。

ptOptions.description: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.
ptOptions.description_zh: 用于配置组件的 passthrough（pt） 选项。

unstyled.description: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.
unstyled.description_zh: 启用后，它会删除核心中与组件相关的样式。

slots.name: default
